title: My Employee Thinks I'm Condescending
description:
Tim runs a construction company and has at least one employee who finds the way Tim manages to be somewhat demeaning. - Dr. Laura: "The best managers don't just lead, they encourage."

Has your employee ever challenged your authority? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
